name: Wormhole Explorer
description:
Welcome to space!

Explore the galaxy, collect precious components and fend off against the alien invaders to open the wormhole. 

Controls: WASD - Movement Q/E - Rotate Camera Right Click - Fire Cannons Instructions:

Avoid the asteroids to prevent damaging your ship (you can blast em!) while you collect the shiny objects floating around the field. Use your lasers to destroy enemy ships attempting to stop you and open the huge wormhole!

Credits:

Pelumi (Xadegamer) - Programming
